ai_docs/decisions/001-worktree-setup.md.content:
# ADR 001: Git Worktree Development Setup

## Status
Accepted

## Context
Need to establish efficient development workflow for {{PROJECT_NAME}} that supports:
- Parallel feature development
- Context switching between branches
- Automated tooling and hooks

## Decision
Implement Git worktree-based development environment using standardized toolkit.

## Consequences

### Positive
- Multiple branches can be worked on simultaneously
- Faster context switching
- Consistent automation across all branches
- Isolated build environments

### Negative
- Learning curve for team members unfamiliar with worktrees
- Additional disk space usage
- More complex initial setup

## Implementation
- Use worktree-setup-toolkit for standardized setup
- Establish consistent directory structure
- Implement automated Git hooks for quality assurance
